channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1526; 09:19PM; 1037 W 67th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Oz4cGC; #VermontSlauson; 24 LAFD Firefighters took less than 13 minutes to access, confine and extinguish heavy flames within an 800 square foot one-story home at the rear of the property. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E66 RA64 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1526; 09:06PM; 1037 W 67th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Oz4cGC; #VermontSlauson; PRELIM: Small one-story home at the rear of the property well involved with fire.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E66 RA64 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1217; 04:38PM; 10650 N Nassau Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KfNVDV; #Sunland; *Address Corrected From Mather Avenue*. First arriving 22 LAFD personnel confined flames to a detached garage at the rear of the property in just 18 minutes. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E289 E298 E77 E91 EM14 RA74 RA77 RA874 T74 T89 T98; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1217; 04:20PM; 10630 N Mather Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DBfTX6; #Sunland; PRELIM: Detached garage at rear of property well involved with fire, flames spreading to nearby vegetation and threatening nearby home.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E289 E298 E77 E91 EM14 RA74 RA77 RA874 T74 T89 T98; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#1162; 03:46PM; Santa Monica Mountains; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OyVxDT; #Brentwood; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a 58 y/o male mountain bicyclist seriously injured in a fall on a remote section of the West Mandeville Ridge Trail in Westridge-Canyonback Wilderness Park. An LAFD Flight Paramedic lowered from a hovering Fire Department rescue helicopter has now been joined by LAFD ground responders, to complete the patient's medical assessment, treatment and stabilization in preparation for a hoist into the helicopter for inflight care during direct transport to a regional trauma center.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC9 E109 E19 E269 H1 H7 HA1 HA7 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1119; 03:34PM; 12632 W Oxnard St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43LmLLO; Valley Glen; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. There are multiple single family dwellings on the property. The original fire unit was well involved and it extended to the attic of one of the exposed homes. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E298 E60 E86 E89 EA1 RA41 T60 T89 T98; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1119; 03:10PM; 12632 W Oxnard St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43LmLLO; Valley Glen; A back house on the property is well involved and exposing an additional single family dwelling. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E298 E60 E86 E89 RA41 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 07/27/2023 INC#1011

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#1011; 03:18PM; Eb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rLksLN; Granada Hills; All Forward Progress Stopped: Approximately 1/4 acre of grass was burning on the south side of the 118 FY x Balboa. That fire jumped the freeway and was at 3/4 acre on the north side, threatening structures. Firefighters extinguished all fire with no structures damaged and no injuries reported. Crews are remaining on scene to conduct mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. Evening commute will likely be affected and drivers are advised to check for alternate routes and CHP for closure updates. No further details.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 CE83 CM40 CM42 CW3A CW3B E100 E103 E104 E107 E18 E2 E273 E275 E28 E287 E289 E290 E296 E305 E72 E73 E75 E77 E8 E87 EM15 EM17 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA83 T105 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T96 WT77; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1011; 02:43PM; Eb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rLksLN; Granada Hills; Initially received as a grass fire, due to the location of the fire near the mutual threat zone the incident was upgraded to a Brush fire response. The size up was 50' x 200' and there is no update. Balboa at the 118 FY is shut down and commuters are advised to seek alternate routes. LAFD apparatus are operating off the shoulder of the freeway. The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:02PM.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 CW3A CW3B E100 E103 E104 E107 E18 E2 E273 E275 E28 E287 E289 E290 E296 E305 E72 E73 E75 E77 E8 E87 EM15 EM17 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA83 T105 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T96 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - Hollywood; INC#0993; 03:09PM; 5666 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/454I0cz; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to the room of origin, preventing it from extending to the attic or adjoining units. Building type updated to a three-plex with two units on the first floor and one unit on the 2nd floor. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E35 E52 E82 RA35 RA835 T27 T35; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
